results.title: Muggers
results.creator_credit: AFFC, Winchester Films, Nigel Odell, David Redman and Dean Murphy
results.brief_description: A comedy that involves sex, surgery and golf - and a lighthearted look at the gruesome business of human organ trafficking. Two young medical students, Brad and Gregor (Matt Day, Jason Barry), find themselves in desperate times as they have no money to pay their fees, the rent or buy food. Mannah from heaven comes in the form of a man jumping to his death in front of them, providing the boys the means to steal his kidney and assist with their financial obligation to local gangster Roy Rogers (Chris Haywood). Roy also has a financial hold on fellow student Sophie (Petra Yared) who works as a prostitute to cover her student costs. In a bid to clear their own debt, and Sophie’s, Brad and Gregor get creative and steal more organs, upsetting the local corrupt ambulance officers who, up to that point, were the main suppliers. Cast includes Nicola Charles, Caroline Gillmer, Simon Bossell, Frank Gallacher.

results.title: Muffin by helicopter
results.brief_description: An episode of the children’s television show “Muffin the Mule” starring Annette Mills on piano and the puppets Muffin the Mule, Oswald the Ostrich, Grace the Giraffe and Peregrine Esq the Penguin. Muffin the Mule returns for a trip to France with a surpprise for Annette - a little giraffe called Grace.

results.title: Mufaro's beautiful daughters (K)
results.creator_credit: Paul R. Gagne, Weston Woods Studios and David R. Paight
results.brief_description: Everyone agrees that Mufaro’s two daughters are very beautiful - the kind Nyasha, and the selfish Manyara. When the king decides to take a wife, the girls are unknowingly tested to reveal which is worthy enough to be the queen. Based on the book by John Steptoe.

results.title: Muddy waters
results.brief_description: A story of land use and abuse in south-west USA. We see the area as it was before the advent of the colonists a few hundred years ago, and the same area as it is at the time of making this film (1937). Overgrazing and intensive farming has depleted soil binding vegetation, and the result is destruction of the soil by floods and erosion. Remedial measures are suggested, with emphasis on the urgent necessity for soil conservation practices.

results.title: Mud
results.brief_description: A study of urban erosion and sedimentation caused by the careless developer or roadbuilder. Explains how engineering skills and conservation practices often applied to rural areas can be used in cities to prevent flooding and other drainage difficulties.

results.title: Mud
results.creator_credit: Firebird Films, Arthur Cantrill and Corinne Cantrill
results.brief_description: An experimental film. Close shots of a bubbling pool of thermal mud in New Zealand are matched to primeval sounds evoking the creation of a world. The sounds are composed of plucked piano bass strings, especially recorded to capture reverberation, slowed-down cymbals, xylophone, wobble board and castanets.

results.title: Muchmore's marvellous machine
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Mathematics for elementary school students: whole numbers”.
Introduces children to the mathematical whole number concept of the decimal system. Suitable for middle primary level.
